title: Schedule F Federal Worker Targeting Operations
description: Systematic analysis of Trump administration plans to convert federal workers to Schedule F status for political loyalty enforcement. Identified 199 pattern instances across TTT documentation showing coordinated efforts to remove civil service protections and install political loyalists.
research_questions: What are the specific mechanisms used for Schedule F implementation?
Who are the key actors coordinating Schedule F conversion efforts?
What timeline evidence exists for systematic federal worker targeting?
How do Schedule F plans connect to broader institutional capture patterns?
Which agencies and positions are prioritized for Schedule F conversion?
source_analysis: Trump Tyranny Tracker Batch 1 Analysis - 199 Schedule F patterns identified across 45 articles
